name: Got Groceries Program
description: Peninsula Volunteers' Got Groceries program provides weekly bags of free groceries to individuals and families facing food insecurity in San Mateo County.
fullDescription: Peninsula Volunteers' Got Groceries program provides weekly bags of free groceries to individuals and families facing food insecurity in San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Full bag of groceries weekly
- Fresh produce, proteins, and breads
- Available to individuals and families
- Distribution every Wednesday
- No income verification required
howToGetIt: Visit a Got Groceries distribution site on Wednesdays. Check the Peninsula Volunteers website for locations and times. No registration required.
keywords: Got Groceries, Peninsula Volunteers, free groceries, San Mateo County, produce, proteins, bread, weekly food
